alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:51AM EDT until July 23 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EDT FOR AUGLAIZE AND MERCER COUNTIES... At 951 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spencerville to Coldwater, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Coldwater, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, St. Henry, Cridersville, Fort Recovery, Rockford, New Knoxville, Moulton, Wabash, Mendon, Chickasaw, Burkettsville, Buckland, Montezuma and Tama. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 113 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
